component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.Frame
component-description.description: A frame support influencing of his subtree, find of subframes, activate- and deactivate-mechanism as well as set/get of a frame window, component or controller.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.Desktop
component-description.description: A desktop environment contains tasks with one or more frames in which components can be loaded. The desktop himself is the root of the frame hierarchy.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.URLTransformer
component-description.description: Helps to split up a string containing a URL into its structural parts and assembles the parts into a single string.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.JobExecutor
component-description.description: It implements a generic job execution service, which can start registered uno services on triggered events, control her lifetime and handle there own configuration.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.DispatchRecorderSupplier
component-description.description: This supplier is available on the servcice Frame as property "DispatchRecorderSupplier". It provides access on the currently set DispatchRecorder of this Frame and some additional functionality to make macro recording easy.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.DispatchRecorder
component-description.description: Implements a recorder object which can record XDIspatch::dispatch() calls and generate basic script code from that.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.MailToDispatcher
component-description.description: It's a dispatch object which can handle "mailto:" URLs. This service is registered in configuration for this protocol and wil be used automaticly by the generic dispatch implementation of a Frame. It should start an external mail application and forward this request to it.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ServiceHandler
component-description.description: It's a special dispatch object which is registered for "service:*" URL pattern and will be automaticly used by the framework dispatch mechanism if such URL occurred. His job is to create any registered uno components which must be coded inside dispatched URL (may with some optional given parameters). After that such created service must be hold his self alive. Such mechanism can be usefull for UI components (e.g. Dialogs, Wizards) only.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.JobHandler
component-description.description: It's a special dispatch object which is registered for "vnd.sun.star.job:*" URL pattern and will be automaticly used by the framework dispatch mechanism if such URL occurred. It binds the dispatch mechanism to the generic job execution of this framework module. That can be used for e.g. addon purposes.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.LayoutManager
component-description.description: Controls the layout of user interface elements which are part of a frame.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.PopupMenuControllerFactory
component-description.description: A factory manager that creates instances of registered popup menu controller.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.FontMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the font popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.FontSizeMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the font size popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ObjectMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the object popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.HeaderMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the header popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.FooterMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the footer popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ControlMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the control popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ToolBarsMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which makes certain toolbars available to the user. It supports to show/hide toolbars.

component-description.author: Duncan Foster
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.MacrosMenuController
component-description.description: A popup menu controller which controls the scripts/macros popup menu.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.UICommandDescription
component-description.description: A manager that holds all user interface commands and their description, the menu label of every registered OpenOffice.org module.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.UIElementFactoryManager
component-description.description: A user interface factory manager that controls all registered user interface element factories.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ModuleManager
component-description.description: Manages the access to OpenOffice.org module specific informations.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.UIConfigurationManager
component-description.description: Manages the user interface element settings of a single storage element, like documents or a single user interface configuration file.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ModuleUIConfigurationManagerSupplier
component-description.description: Central manager that provides access to the OpenOffice.org module user interface configuration managers.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ModuleUIConfigurationManager
component-description.description: A single OpenOffice.org module user interface configuration manager. It is responsible to provide access to the user interface element settings of an OpenOffice.org module. Must be obtained from the ModuleUIConfigurationManagerSupplier otherwise it is not correctly initialized.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.MenuBarFactory
component-description.description: Creates menu bars that can be used the user interface configuration API.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.UIConfigurationManager
component-description.description: Manages the user interface element settings of a single storage element, like documents or a single user interface configuration file.

component-description.author: Andreas Schluens
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.BackingComp
component-description.description: The start module component.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.UICategoryDescription
component-description.description: Description about categories of user interface commands.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ToolBarFactory
component-description.description: A factory to create toolbar instances.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.ToolBarControllerFactory
component-description.description: A factory to create registered toolbar bar controller.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.StatusbarFactory
component-description.description: A factory to create registered status bar controller.

component-description.author: Carsten Driesner
component-description.name: com.sun.star.comp.framework.StatusbarControllerFactory
component-description.description: A factory to create registered status bar controller.
